definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Hapag-Lloyd is also the 2nd largest provider of containerized reefer capacity in the world.
sentences.chinese: 赫伯罗特也是世界第二大冷冻集装箱运输服务提供者。

sentences.english: Each software service can act as a service provider or requester.
sentences.chinese: 每个软件服务均可充当一个服务提供者或请求者。

sentences.english: Users can search for providers based on their own ZIP codes.
sentences.chinese: 用户可以根据他们自己的邮政编码搜索服务提供者。

sentences.english: For this example, you will first deploy the service provider application.
sentences.chinese: 对于此示例，将首先部署服务提供者应用程序。

sentences.english: It protects the data being exchanged between service providers and service consumers.
sentences.chinese: 它保护服务提供者与服务使用者之间交换的数据。

sentences.english: HKJMA is merely a service provider and do not assume or be implied with any legal responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 商会仅为服务提供者并不承担任或隠喻何法律责任。

sentences.english: Head Office will ask the school if they require a replacement full-time FT be provided.
sentences.chinese: 服务提供者将征求学校是否需要提供替补专职外师。

sentences.english: The messaging middleware routes the message to the destination of the service provider.
sentences.chinese: 消息传递中间件将消息路由到服务提供者的目的地。

sentences.english: Transcodes requests into the targeted service provider's format.
sentences.chinese: 将请求代码转换为目标服务提供者的格式。

sentences.english: This increases the dependency on service providers.
sentences.chinese: 这增加了对服务提供者的依赖。

sentences.english: In SOA terms, the personnel department is a service provider.
sentences.chinese: 按SOA的术语来说，人事部门是一个服务提供者。

sentences.english: The service provider will not receive every request message.
sentences.chinese: 服务提供者并不会接收每条请求消息。

sentences.english: The service provider catalog is an optional part of the service discovery process.
sentences.chinese: 服务提供者目录是服务发现进程中的一个可选的部件。

sentences.english: The correlation of a response with its request by both the client and service provider.
sentences.chinese: 客户机和服务提供者把响应与相应的请求关联在一起。

sentences.english: The service provider simulates a checking account crediting service.
sentences.chinese: 服务提供者将模拟一个活期存款帐户信贷服务。

definition: producer (of goods, commodities or farm produce etc)/manufacturer/(biology) autotroph
